Header: Parliament debate on 19th amendment on April 9th and 10th
Content: The JVP Leader Anura Kumara Dissanayake said that the parliament debate on the 19th Constitutional Amendment is to be held on April 9th and 10th. Addressing a media briefing held in Colombo today, the JVP leader quoted the president as saying that the President promised him in the National Executive Council that he would give his fullest support to pass the new Amendment.
